feed.title: LANCommander Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.0.2
entry.content:
Server

  • Changed: Getting a list of games from the API no longer filters out mods/expansions

Launcher

  • Fixed: Player's alias is now correctly populated in $NewPlayerAlias when launching a game
  • Fixed: Profile avatar is now pulled on application start
  • Fixed: The importer will attempt to reimport media if it's missing

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.0.3
entry.content:
Server

  • Fixed: A bug that was causing servers to produce malformed LCX files on export has been fixed
  • Fixed: A bug that caused servers to fail on import when a console was defined has been fixed

Launcher

  • Fixed: Issues with application startup on new installs has been fixed
  • Fixed: When extracting save files, there was the potential for nested directories to not get extracted properly. This should be resolved now

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.0.4
entry.content:
Launcher

  • Fixed: Downloads are now queued properly (#131)
  • Fixed: Errors for password requirements and other validation issues are now displayed properly on the registration form (#132)
  • Fixed: A minor display issue with the loading indicator on the registration form has been fixed
  • Fixed: Save files are now packaged with UTF-8 filenames
  • Fixed: The launcher will no longer crash if an installed game has no actions available

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.1.1
entry.content:
Server

  • Added ability to disable user libraries
  • Fix page crashes after saving role
  • Fixed role creation
  • Clear user cache on role assignment/unassignment
  • Fix demotion of administrators (#175)
  • Increase performance when getting all games

Launcher

  • Allow pressing enter in server address field to process with login
  • Actions are now sorted properly when starting a game
  • Fixed script execution
  • Fixed duplicate games in depot
